name: Brut@l
description: A modern re-imagining of the classic ASCII dungeon crawler. Choose your hero and descend into a procedurally generated world constructed entirely from ASCII letters. Can you survive?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0GHz i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 1 GB of Video RAM (requires DX9.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard
